article.Body:
The Prime Minister has received recommendations to stop setting annual fiscal deficit target and rather amend the Fiscal Responsibility and Budget Management (FRBM) Act, says CNBC-TV18’s Nayantara Rai, quoting sources.

As per sources, a panel led by a government secretary had made a presentation to PM Modi in January and advised the government to set fiscal prudence goals based on revenue collection.

Watch video for more.
